original_text: On this side Jordan, in the valley over against Bethpeor, in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt at Heshbon, whom Moses and the children of Israel smote, after they were come forth out of Egypt:
korean_text: 요단 동쪽 벳브올 맞은편 골짜기에서 그리하였더라 이 땅은 헤스본에 사는 아모리 족속의 왕 시혼에게 속하였더니 모세와 이스라엘 자손이 애굽에서 나온 후에 그를 쳐서 멸하고

sentences.original_text: in the valley over against Bethpeor
in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites
whom Moses and the children of Israel smote
after they were come forth out of Egypt
